description: Get ready to witness the ultimate elections battle, as Panchayat returns with its season four. This village series is coming back with its original star cast and outstanding plot. The story will follow the elections and the heat to win the victory will demand everything to be kept on stake. Watch Panchayat Season 4 from 2nd July 2025 only on Prime Video.
title: Panchayat Season 4 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: A team of archaeologists has unearthed two 2,300-year-old swords, accompanied by burial artifacts like brooches, jewelry, etc., in the necropolis in France. The presence of swastikas remains a matter of consideration. These swords belong to the second Iron Age.
title: 2,300-year-old Swords with Swastika Discovered: Everything You Need to Know

description: AI bots posing as real users infiltrated Reddit to test their power of persuasion. The covert study, run by Zurich researchers without consent, posted over 1,700 comments and triggered backlash. Moderators condemned the experiment as unethical, while Reddit vowed legal action, warning of AI’s growing influence over digital discourse.
title: AI Researchers Secretly Used Reddit to Test Chatbot Persuasion

description: Cosmos 482, a Soviet Venus lander stranded in Earth’s orbit since a failed launch in 1972, is expected to reenter the atmosphere between May 8 and May 14, 2025. Experts believe it may partially survive reentry due to its durable Venus-resistant design, sparking interest among scientists and space watchers globally.
title: Soviet Venus Probe Cosmos 482 Expected to Reenter Earth After 52 Years in Orbit

description: NASA’s SPHEREx space telescope has begun its mission to scan the entire sky in 102 infrared wavelengths, capturing 3,600 images daily. Over the next two years, it will create a 3D map of hundreds of millions of galaxies, explore cosmic inflation, and search for life-forming ingredients in the Milky Way—unlocking new insights into the universe’s origin and structure.
title: NASA’s New Space Telescope Starts Mapping to Reveal Universe’s Deep Mysteries

description: A French Egyptologist says that he has discovered encrypted messages praising  Pharaoh Ramesses the great as divinely chosen by the gods on the Luxor Obelisk in Paris. These hidden hieroglyphs, visible only from a specific angle, were allegedly meant for Egyptian nobility arriving at Luxor Temple during ancient rituals. While the discovery offers a new perspective on royal propaganda, some experts remain skeptical due to visibility concerns. The full findings will be published soon in a peer-reviewed journal for scholarly review.
title: Ancient Praise for Pharaoh Ramesses II Found on Paris Obelisk, Egyptologist Claims

description: The government of the Kyrgyz Republic signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Binance on May 4 aiming at a long-term partnership. Sadyr Nurgozhoevich Japarov, the President of the land-locked central Asian country, was present for the MoU signing.
title: Binance Partners With Kyrgyz Republic to Introduce Crypto Payments, Increase Web3 Awareness

description: Lava Yuva Star 2 was launched in India on Monday. The latest budget offering from domestic smartphone brand Lava has a 6.75-inch HD+ display and a 5,000mAh battery. The Lava Yuva Star 2 comes in two distinct colour options and runs on a Unisoc processor alongside 4GB of RAM. It has a dual rear camera unit led by a 13-megapixel primary sensor.
title: Lava Yuva Star 2 With 6.75-Inch Display, 5,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Grand Theft Auto 6 was delayed last week, shifting its original Fall 2025 release window to a definitive launch date of May 26, 2026. While a section of fans was left surprised by the announcement, several employees at developer Rockstar Games reportedly saw the initial launch window as unrealistic.
title: Rockstar Games Employees Reportedly Believed GTA 6 Delay Was 'Inevitable'

description: Realme C75 5G has been launched in India. The handset comes with an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset paired with up to 6GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage. It is backed by a 6,000mAh battery with 45W wired and 5W reverse charging support. The smartphone is equipped with a 32-megapixel dual rear camera unit and an 8-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Realme C75 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Dubai-based MBS crypto exchange is set to allocate $8.8 billion (roughly Rs. 74,164 crore) over a period of five years to grow the Web3 ecosystem in Maldives. The creation of the "Maldives International Financial Centre" is the focus point of Maldives' crypto-related masterplan, Financial Times claimed in its report.
title: Dubai's MBS Global Investments to Build $9 Billion Financial Hub in the Maldives: Report

description: Artificial intelligence (AI) technology and automation driven by it could soon impact 40 percent of the global workforce, claims a new report by the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD). The report highlights that by 2033, AI could become a multi-trillion-dollar market. However, the economic growth could be highly concentrated, leading to wider inequalities.
title: AI-Driven Automation Could Threaten 40 Percent of Jobs Globally, UN Experts Claim

description: Google can reportedly use content from publishers even if they have opted out of artificial intelligence (AI) training. As per the report, a Google DeepMind executive revealed the information during a testimony in the company’s ongoing antitrust case against the US Justice Department. The executive reportedly highlighted that such content is not used in the AI models developed by DeepMind.
title: Google Can Reportedly Use Content to Train Search AI Even If Publishers Opt Out

description: iQOO Neo 10 will soon join the iQOO Neo 10R handset in India. The company has officially teased the arrival of the standard model in the country. Alongside teasing the design, the brand has confirmed that the phone will be equipped with dual chipsets, possibly including a dedicated gaming chip. Notably, the iQOO Neo 10 was launched in China alongside a Pro variant in November 2024.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Set to Launch in India Soon; Design Teased Ahead of Debut

description: OnePlus Nord 5 is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the OnePlus Nord 4 which debuted in April 2024. The purported phone was spotted on a certification website which reveals details about its battery capacity and charging speed. According to a report, it may be equipped with a 6,650mAh battery — a significant increase over the 5500mAh battery capacity of the current Nord 4.
title: OnePlus Nord 5 With 6,650mAh Battery Reportedly Spotted on Certification Site Ahead of Launch

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is now live for all shoppers in India. The sale, which started on May 1 after providing an early 12-hour access for Amazon Prime users, brings offers and discounts for products across different categories, including mobile phones, accessories, laptops, wearables, kitchen products, TVs and other electronic appliances. The best discounts on earbuds and headphones can be found here, and a list of top offers on gaming laptops is here.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Earbuds and Headphones During the Sale

description: Based on a real-life diplomatic rescue mission, The Diplomat explores the story of Uzma Ahmed and Indian diplomat JP Singh. Starring John Abraham, this gripping political drama streams on Netflix from May 9, 2025.
title: Diplomat OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch John Abraham's Political Thriller Online?

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 has just completed its first weekend and entered the second week. The e-commerce giant started the summer-focused sale on May 1 at noon for all users, after providing a 12-hour exclusive window for Prime members. During the sale, shoppers can find discounts on a wide variety of products across categories such as smartphones, laptops, earphones, smart TVs, home appliances, and more.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on 2 Ton Air Conditioners

description: Customers can get up to an 80 percent discount on cameras and accessories. Apart from this, one can also get No Cost EMI on select models. Apart from this, users can also get a 10 percent instant discount while using an HDFC Bank credit card and EMI transactions.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Cameras

description: If you’re on the hunt for a front-loading washing machine to make laundry less of a hassle, then the Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 is a great avenue for buying one. The sale kicked off on May 1 for users in India and brings hefty discounts on products across various categories such as smartphones, tablets, headphones, refrigerators, washing machines, and other electronics.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Front Loading Washing Machines

description: Amazon is offeringup to a 40 percent discount on home appliances. Apart from this, one can also get No Cost EMI on select models. Moreover, users will get a 10 percent instant discount while using an HDFC Bank credit card and EMI transactions. Interestingly, customers can get a microwave for as low as Rs. 4,899 during the Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Microwave Ovens

description: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025 began for all users in India at noon on May 1. Amazon Prime users got a 12-hour head start as the sale went live for them at midnight on the same day. During the ongoing sale, a wide range of items is being offered at lowered prices with lucrative offers. Here, we have put together the top deals that you can enjoy on mobile accessories.
title: Amazon Great Summer Sale 2025: Best Deals on Mobile Accessories

description: Written, directed, and edited by Pushkar Sunil Mahabal, Black White & Gray - Love Kills is a crime thriller series that follows the investigation of high-profile serial killings. The scenes are spellbinding, and the cast has delivered an outstanding performance. This series is currently streaming on Sony LIV in 8 different languages. Watch Now.
title: Black, White & Gray - Love Kills Now Streaming on SonyLIV: What You Need to Know

description: CMF Phone 2 Pro is now available for purchase in India. The CMF Phone 1 successor was launched in the country last week. The CMF Phone 2 Pro is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro chipset alongside 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of storage. The CMF Phone 2 Pro has a 6.77-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz adaptive refresh rate and features a triple rear camera unit.
title: CMF Phone 2 Pro With Dimensity 7300 Pro Chip Goes on Sale in India: Price, Sale Offers

description: Google redesigned Gemini’s side panel on the web client last week. The Mountain View-based tech giant has now added an infinite scrolling feature to let users find older conversations with the artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot. The new side panel design also pushes Gems higher up the panel, and consolidates previously directly available menu options within the “Settings & help” option.
title: Google Redesigns Gemini's Side Panel on the Web, Adds Infinite Scrolling for Past Conversations

description: Microsoft will be retiring its legacy video-conferencing platform Skype today (May 5). It offered Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP)-based video telephony, video-conferencing and voice calling capabilities. The announcement was made in February, with the Redmond-based tech giant prioritising Teams app as the main free consumer communications offering.
title: Microsoft to Shut Down Skype Today in Favour of Microsoft Teams: How to Transition and What’s Next

description: Samsung has asked the Customs Excise and Service Tax Appellate Tribunal in Mumbai to quash a $520 million (roughly Rs. 4,381 crore) tax demand for allegedly misclassifying imports of networking gear. The South Korean giant has said that Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance also imported the same component in a similar manner for years.
title: Samsung Fights $520 Million India Tax Demand, Points to Reliance Practice

description: Samsung released the One UI 7 based on Android 15 alongside the Galaxy S25 series during its Galaxy Unpacked event earlier this year. The new software made its way to older models like the Galaxy S24 series and Galaxy S23 series in April. The new update is causing significant battery drain issues for some models.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Series, Galaxy Z Fold 6 Users Report Battery Drain Issue Following One UI 7 Update

description: Samsung is expected to introduce the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Galaxy Z Flip 7 handsets later this year. A tipster now claims that the purported smartphones have entered their production stage. The book-style Galaxy Z Fold 7 is tipped to come with a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, while the clamshell Galaxy Z Flip 7 may arrive with an in-house Exynos 2500 chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 Production Reportedly Begins Ahead of Anticipated Debut in July

description: iPhone 17 Air (or Slim) is anticipated to go official in September alongside the vanilla iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro and iPhone 17 Pro Max. The new model, which is expected to replace the iPhone 16 Plus, is likely to arrive as the thinnest iPhone ever. As we wait for the official reveal, a report emerged about the battery capability of the iPhone 17 Air. The new model will reportedly not be able to compete in battery life compared to the other iPhone 17 models.
title: iPhone 17 Air Said to Require Optional Battery Case to Offer One Day of Battery Life on a Single Charge

description: Apple is reportedly working with Anthropic to develop an artificial intelligence (AI) supported version of Xcode. The Cupertino-based tech giant’s official integrated development environment (IDE) for developing software across all its platforms was upgraded with an AI coding companion dubbed Swift Assist last year. But now, the company is planning to integrate AI capabilities much more comprehensively.
title: Apple Said to Be Working With Anthropic on AI-Powered Version of Xcode

description: Apple has yet to launch the iPhone 17 series, which is expected to arrive in September this year. However, details about the iPhone 18 lineup, which is not expected until late 2026, have started surfacing online. The rumoured handsets have been tipped to come with improved RAM and chipsets. A new report suggests that the Cupertino tech giant could switch up its plans for the release of its phones starting in 2026.
title: Apple Said to Switch to Staggered Release Schedule for iPhone 18 Series, Foldable iPhone

description: Apple shared a new video on Saturday, offering a hands-on experience of the different Apple Intelligence tools it offers. The new video comes just a few days after the Cupertino-based tech giant released a video focused on its artificial intelligence (AI) clean-up tool’s use cases. Interestingly, the company first introduced its suite of AI features in December 2024, with the release of the iOS 18.2 update.
title: Apple Showcases Visual Intelligence, ChatGPT Integration and Image Clean Up Features in New Hands-On Video

description: The overall crypto market dipped by 1.50 percent in the last 24 hours. On Monday, May 5, Bitcoin and Ether both registered small losses. Majority altcoins dropped in their prices as the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) gets set to assess US' economic status this week. Market is volatile and analysts advice caution to investors.
title: Bitcoin Price Drops to $94,000 Ahead of US FOMC Meeting as Altcoin Momentum Slows

description: Google is said to be developing a new desktop experience for its Pixel phones. As per a report, the latest Android 16 beta update adds a new developer option dubbed “Enable desktop experience features”. It brings the familiar Android taskbar, the three-button navigation access, and other options, when a Pixel running the aforementioned beta is connected to a laptop.
title: Google May Introduce New Samsung DeX-Style Desktop Experience for Phones with Android 16

description: Spotify said on Friday its US app update has secured Apple's approval to show pricing information and external payment links. The Swedish streaming giant, along with several other tech firms, had been at loggerheads with Apple over its App Store policies, which required developers to pay a commission on in-app purchases, including subscriptions.
title: Spotify's US App Update with Purchase Links Gets Apple Approval

description: Vivo’s newest mid-range smartphone appears to check all the boxes for the perfect low-end mid-range smartphone. It has a stylish design, a capable processor and a large battery that lasts long and also charges quickly. However, after testing it out we found that it is not perfect. But it might still find its way into the hands of some buyers. Here’s why.
title: Vivo T4 Review: Nearly Perfect

description: Honor 400 is said to be in development and could soon join the Honor 400 Lite in the company’s lineup. Ahead of its introduction, specifications of the purported handset have been leaked which reveal potential upgrades.
title: Honor 400 to Reportedly Debut with Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 Chipset; Price, Other Specifications Leak

description: Apple is reportedly eyeing a significant redesign for its iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max. The Cupertino-based tech giant is expected to pack under-display Face ID for the first time alongside a new screen layout for next year's flagship iPhone models. This design shift could serve as a transitional step toward the 2027 iPhone, which will mark the 20th anniversary of the iPhone with a completely seamless display.
title: iPhone 19 Said to Sport Full-Screen Display to Mark 20th Anniversary, iPhone 18 Pro Might Feature Under-Display Camera

description: Motorola Edge 60s will be unveiled in China soon. Alongside announcing the launch date, the company has revealed the design and colour options of the upcoming handset. The phone will be unveiled in the country alongside the base and Pro variants of the Edge 60 and the Razr 60 clamshell foldable lineup. The company has revealed the RAM, storage configurations, and some build details of the Edge 60s version.
title: Motorola Edge 60s Launch Date Set for May 8; Design, Colourways Revealed

description: Motorola Edge 60 was launched globally almost 10 days ago and the rumour mill is already churning out details about its successor. As per a report, an early render of the Motorola Edge 70 has surfaced, showing the design changes expected to arrive with the purported smartphone, although there aren’t many.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Render Surfaces with Minimal Design Changes; Could Get Dimensity 7000 Series Chip
